function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent social distancing recommendations in different countries","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and confusion among the public","Mitigation":"Standardization of social distancing guidelines and clear communication to the public","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling to support decision-making","People":"General public","Owner":"Policy makers and health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of data to fully support spatial separation rules for disease transmission","Impact":"Potential ineffective measures and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Research and data collection to validate spatial separation guidelines","Technologies":"Data collection technologies, research studies, and data analysis","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Need for flexible disease transmission models to accommodate different assumptions","Impact":"Inability to accurately predict disease transmission and effectiveness of measures","Mitigation":"Development of adaptable disease transmission models and scenario analysis","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and simulation software","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"}]}
